Technology.name: Metallurgy
Technology.shortDescription: The metals that populate your world.
Technology.researchedDescription:
The world is full of many interesting things. Animals roam the fields, monsters rule the night, and eldritch energies course throughout the land. Perhaps most beneficial to you, however, are the various ores that inhabit the ground. Iron and coal are plentiful, but you know both are merely the tip of the iceberg when it comes to structural integrity and fuel.
Titanium
This silvery metal quickly corrodes when exposed to air, resulting in a dark oxidation on its surface. It is most commonly found at depths of 40 to 0. It has extremely high durability, making it suitable for encasing mechanisms and circuitry. You theorize that you can also temper this metal by running it under intense heat for extra durability.
Platinum
A rare, shiny metal, renowned for its resistance to corrosion. Most commonly found between depths of 30 and 0, it is useful for electronics where exposure to hostile chemicals is a certainty.
Thorium
A heavy metal, with uses in nuclear decay chains. Found in depths of 50 to 0, it's only truly useful once you figure out how to harness the power of its nuclear decay.

Technology.name: Basic Circuits
Technology.researchedDescription: Machines and mechanisms are worthless heaps of metal unless there is a purpose behind them. You have deduced a simple set of logical mechanisms and a simple means of producing them.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemConductivePowder:0-1--This powder balances the volatility of farenite with the stability of lapis, making it useful for conduction.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemBoard:0-1--A simple assembly of sticks, side-by-side, gives a base for mounting logic assemblies.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemSpool:0-1--Just a thin rod of wood with end caps, it makes an excellent storage unit for wires.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemSpoolGold:0-1--Your studies show gold is an excellent conductor, and you plan on using nothing but the highest quality for your machines.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemSpoolPlatinum:0-1--Some thin platinum wire on a spool. Useful for corrosive environments.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemMicrochip:0-1--Thin wiring on a solid board, these multipurpose devices enable your machines to perform basic logic.__

Technology.name: Machining
Technology.researchedDescription: __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemMicroPlating:0-1--Tempered Titanium siding, some basic logic for input/output and power flow regulation, and a slimeball to ensure plugs stick. Simple yet effective.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: If you're going to invest resources in expensive machines, you figure it's only best that you create something to encase the fragile inner workings with. Better yet if these cases also have ports to enable easy input/output and power sockets. A little bit of slime can go a long way in that instance.

Technology.name: Scientific Theory
Technology.researchedDescription: What is a scientist without the scientific method? Luckily for you, you no longer have to experiment. This handy Research Computer analyzes all of your knowledge and will theorize prototypes for you to make. Stick these prototypes into the Research Console to have it analyze the potential uses and to store the standardized blueprints into your knowledge store. __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockResearchComputer:0-1--Allows visual access to your personalized knowledge store.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockResearchConsole:0-1--Analyzes your prototypes and generates standardized blueprints.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemPortableResearchComputer:0-1--A research computer on a stick.__

Technology.name: Algorithms
Technology.shortDescription: Ordering machines to do your bidding.
Technology.researchedDescription: A simple set of rules and methods that is capable of governing an entire realm of machines. __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemPaperSchematic:0-1--A thick durable sheet of paper.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemMicroLogicCore:0-1--While formulating your logic for the ports, you conceive of a large set of circuits that is capable of forming the logical core of a machine.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockEncoder:0-1--A simple machine that encodes the layout of items into a schematic.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: These machines and ideas are starting to get too complicated! Time to get some scratch space for jotting it all down! *You read off your digital screen. Speaking of, you realize you never found a keyboard for it.

Technology.name: Mechanical Precision
Technology.researchedDescription: The simplest starts can lead to the largest things. __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemHeatingCoil:0-1--A simple setup that turns stored energy back into heat. This coil heats up hot enough to melt metal.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockMicroFurnace:0-1--Wrapping up the Heating Coil in the safe confines of some plating, along with a logic core to make sure your base doesn't go up in flames.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Now that you have the power and the logic, time to apply! The simplest application of the power you have stored is immediate transformation back into energy, in the form of heat.

Technology.name: Power of Nothing
Technology.researchedDescription: The world is stranger than you ever thought it would be. Simple contraptions are capable of altering the foundations of reality. And you have the knowledge to capitalize on it.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemVacuumCore:0-1--The addition of the enderpearl seems to have both amplified and generalized the magnetic strength of Lodestone.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Enderpearls exert a strange effect, seemingly bending space around them. You wonder what the effect of Lodestone would be when augmented with the reality-warping properties of this astounding item.

Technology.name: Vacuum Tubes
Technology.researchedDescription: Simple but fast item transfer.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockVacuumTube:0-1--With four slots per block, this 1-way item transfer works at blazing speeds.__Vacuum tubes will glow red when they contain too many items. Additionally, they will suck items in from the world, or blow them back out.
Technology.discoveredDescription: With some clever leapfrogging and metal channels, you think that you can use your newfound Vacuum Cores to enable item transfer.

Technology.name: Suction Pipes
Technology.researchedDescription: Simple but fast liquid distribution.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockSuctionPipe:0-1--These 2-mode pipes will either distribute or pull liquid from adjacent tanks.__Suction pipes will attempt to distribute liquid evenly throughout all connected pipes. Shift-right-click with an interface device turns the pipe to blackout mode, stopping all packet updates and blocking out liquid rendering.
Technology.discoveredDescription: With a watertight tube and a Vacuum Tube, it's dead simple to induce liquid transfer.

Technology.name: Nano Circuits
Technology.researchedDescription: __Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanochip:0-1--A direct improvement on the microchip. Key farenite trails allow for blazing fast logic propagation.__With the addition of redstone logic, the general nanochip can become specialized for use in key circuit designs.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanoCalculator:0-1--The calculator is great for complex mathematical operations that are too difficult for applications without a computer.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanoRegulator:0-1--The regulator has applications in multi-variable resource management problems.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanoSimulator:0-1--The simulator mimics material processes for use in predictive analysis.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Your first machine-fabricated circuitry. Let's see just how small the machines can go.

Technology.name: Advanced Programming
Technology.researchedDescription: You doubt that there exists one core that is capable of handling all of the different mechanisms required, but you can at least devise a starting point.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemBasicAICore:0-1--This core provides a starting framework for plugging in additional logic.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Much like your previous machines had a micro logic core, your new machines are going to need a controller to manage all their processes.

Technology.name: Workload Scheduling
Technology.researchedDescription: Whether scheduling I/O operations, threading priority, or merely planning your next day in the workshop, the Scheduler Core has you covered.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemSchedulerCore:0-1--Advanced goal seeking with backtracking and pattern matching capabilities, with a nice UI to boot.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: One of the most applicable problems is the correct scheduling of jobs while having limited resources. Making a circuit capable of solving problems of this sort means useful applications everywhere.

Technology.name: Pattern Recognition
Technology.researchedDescription: Useful for catching and fixing errors in random or fluctuating environments. The Learning Core maintains its knowledge and incorporates new information into its world view.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemLearningCore:0-1--A collection of memory and processing circuits, the core learns from new information and applies its knowledge towards a goal.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: A useful application for the basic AI core would be some sort of algorithm to recognize and report on patterns.

Technology.name: Resource Optimization
Technology.researchedDescription: Magically finding corners to cut all over the place, the Manager Core appears to bend the laws of reality in its stinginess.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemManagerCore:0-1--Curiously, when applied to designing new circuits, the Manager Core refuses to work on improving any design but its own.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: As your rapidly dwindling stockpiles show, you may not have been prudent in your resource consumption. Perhaps your shiny new processor cores could help you with this problem in the future?

Technology.name: Basic Chemistry
Technology.researchedDescription: Inspecting the materials around you leads you to the conclusion that several of these materials share similarities with each other. Long nights of study and experiments have shown that, in fact, these objects are created out of complex combinations of several, smaller components.__Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:stone:0-1--Stone____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:grass:0-1--Grass Block____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:dirt:0-1--Dirt____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:cobblestone:0-1--Cobblestone____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:planks:32767-1--Oak Wood Planks____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:planks:0-1--Oak Wood Planks____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:sapling:0-1--Oak Quartz____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemDustFarenite:0-1--Farenite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemIngotTitanium:0-1--Titanium Ingot____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemIngotPlatinum:0-1--Platinum Ingot____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemIngotThorium:0-1--Thorium Ingot__

Technology.name: Potentiality
Technology.researchedDescription: Eureka! You finally found a power source worthy of the name. Through various processes, Farenite has the potential to store and release energy in the form of oscillating photons. Though your efforts are crude now, you know that you can only get better! __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemMicroCoil:0-1--A simple block of condensed conductive powder, this induces photon oscillation acting as a solenoid for potential energy. You have a feeling this will have widespread uses.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockMicroCable:0-1--A rickety assembly, the MicroCable is composed of many micro coils to move power around. The wires will act to equalize power among each other and they have an internal buffer that collects and moves energy.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Through experimentation, you know Farenite has tremendous power storage potential. A simple assembly of wires and conducting powder may be able to provide a buffer for storage and transfer of energy potential.

Technology.name: Potentiality Storage
Technology.researchedDescription: __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemBattery:0-1--Though not much use for anything else, these batteries can store a large amount of power in a small space.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockMicroCube:0-1--Nothing more than a big box of batteries and some basic input/output circuits. Each side is individually toggleable with an interface device to determine whether it accepts power or outputs it.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemInterfaceDeviceMicro:0-1--A computer on a stick, with a flexible plug.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Though micro coils can store some power, you know there's a better way to cram more power into a smaller space. Forming a metal case to hold the conductive powder might be a better way to ensure that the inherent volatility is contained.

Technology.name: Potentiality Harnessing
Technology.shortDescription: Harness the Potential all around you.
Technology.researchedDescription: In order to use the atmospheric power, you need something built to take this amount of energy. If it could store some amount as well, all the better. __Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockBaseMicroCharging:0-1--A battery box with input cables and a manager core to handle the various stresses of environmental effects.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockCoilMicroCharging:0-1--Nothing more than micro coils and a cover intended to grab as much energy from the air as possible.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: On a particularly windy day, you touched one of the micro coils you had lying around only to receive a large shock. You realize that the air itself contains power just waiting for the micro coils to yank it out.

Technology.name: Potentiality Generation
Technology.researchedDescription: The curious arrangement of metal in Heating Coils leads to the interesting property that, instead of consuming power, moving a Lodestone-interactive material near it produces power.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockMagneticInductionGenerator:0-1--Generates power based on the movement of neighboring magnetic blocks.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: If Lodestone exerts a force upon other metals, you figure that you must be able to use this force to generate power.

Technology.name: Advanced Chemistry
Technology.researchedDescription: These "Atoms", though fewer in number, appear to completely describe the behaviors of molecules. Though not all combinations of atoms are used, it appears extremely difficult to create alternate combinations.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMicroCrystal:0-1--Micro Crystal____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemProteinChain:0-1--Protein Chain____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNerveCluster:0-1--Nerve Cluster____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemConductiveAlloy:0-1--Conductive Alloy____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMetalComposite:0-1--Metal Composite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFibrousStrand:0-1--Fibrous Strand____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMineralLattice:0-1--Mineral Lattice____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFungalSpores:0-1--Fungal Spores____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemIonicChunk:0-1--Ionic Chunk____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemReplicatingMaterial:0-1--Replicating Material____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemSpinyFilament:0-1--Spiny Filament____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemHardenedBulb:0-1--Hardened Bulb____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMorphicChannel:0-1--Morphic Channel____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemSynthesizedFiber:0-1--Synthesized Fiber____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemOrganometallicPlate:0-1--Organometallic Plate__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Noticing common behavior even among as small of things as your discovered "Molecules", you can't help but wonder that maybe there exists something smaller than them. After all, you would never have thought Molecules existed before you began your experiments. Your new machinery may possibly be able to uncover the answer for you.

Technology.name: Artificial Materials
Technology.researchedDescription: With power flow regulators and plugins for the new nano circuitry, Nano Plating will prove to be just as useful as its predecessor.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanoPlating:0-1--Stylish and functional. Resistant to corrosion, spider venom, and rogue AIs.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Though micro plating has proliferated throughout all of your machines, it simply isn't technologically advanced enough to support some of these newer electronics. Time to create the casing of the future!

Technology.name: Farenite Stabilization
Technology.researchedDescription: Pure Farenite driven Proton Oscillation Induction promotes greater potential transfer and storage. Farenite = more power, faster.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFluidicConductor:0-1--With mathematically placed grooves, excess Farenite energy is absorbed by the Quartz and released as energy pulses that counteract the volatility wave.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemNanoCoil:0-1--Acting upon the same principle of Micro Coils, except without the calming factor of Lapis.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoCable:0-1--Lean, green, powering machines.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: With your study of the composition of Farenite and its properties, you think that it's possible you no longer have to cut pure Farenite dust with Lapis in order to make it usable.

Technology.name: Geothermal Harnessing
Technology.researchedDescription: The cause of Farenite's volatility has been found! It appears a reverse tunneling effect can occur under proper stimulation. Heat from the surrounding environment tunnels into Farenite and is then released in the form of Farenite's infamous spontaneous energy waves.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockCryoEndothermalChargingBase:0-1--A series of tubes capable of absorbing and changeling Farenite's natural energy wavelengths. Capable of accepting a chain of up to 15 coils from the bottom.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockCryoEndothermalChargingCoil:0-1--Designed to provoke spontaneous Farenite reactions. Cold objects nearby generate power, as they naturally give Thermal energy a place to go, and thus tunnel into Farenite. Occasionally, the tunneling effect can occur on objects further away, generating spontaneous energy bursts.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: The earth under your feet has plenty of energy in the form of heat. It's never cold, you notice. It should be cold. Make it so.

Technology.name: Potentiality Transformation
Technology.researchedDescription: By equalizing the electron orbitals of similar particles in the accompanying particle slurry, the photons from one energy level can be absorbed and turned into photons of the other energy level.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockOrbitalEqualizer:0-1--This machine alternates which power level it converts to as fast as it can.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemInterfaceDeviceNano:0-1--Extending the basic implement with newer circuitry.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: The photons, as well as the slurry of photon-generating particles, produced by the different tiers of machines are completely incompatable. Perhaps there is a way to convert between the two?

Technology.name: Industrial Storage
Technology.researchedDescription: The Nanocube is a 3x3x3 structure. The entire assembly is built around a Microcube, which is used to regulate some of the internal energy waves. Each of the six sides of the Microcube is piped through a Nanocube Port, which transforms and regulates the energy flow. Like the microcube, the setting of each port can be individually controlled. The remaining part of the structure is Nanocube Frame, which is both additional storage and protection.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoCubeFrame:0-1--Power storage wrapped up inside extra protective plating.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoCubePort:0-1--Power transformation and regulation ports.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Let's face it. Though Micro-cube banks may be fun, the space requirement is ridiculous. With the super chemical Farenite, could you possibly fit more power into a much smaller area?

Technology.name: Kinetic Dissociation
Technology.researchedDescription: Capable of smelting 8 loads at a time, and at a much faster rate than the Micro Furnace, the Nano Innervator is definitely the furnace to beat.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoInnervator:0-1--A feat of modern engineering. Never has smelting been faster.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Though handy and efficient, the Micro Furnace is simply too slow to keep up with current processing demands. Time to design the next iteration!

Technology.name: Atomic Manipulation
Technology.researchedDescription: Your logic circuits and AI cores make short work of this problem. Shrinking down the tools and using faster circuits, it becomes all too easy.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoDismantler:0-1--Capable of everything its predecessor could do and more. It can work on multiple items at a time, as well as working faster.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoFabricator:0-1--Capable of working from the nano scale up to the macro scale. Its many cores and tools allow it to assemble items in parallel.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Manipulating "Molecules" is not enough. If you really want to gain control over all elements of the universe, you must be able to manipulate these "Atoms" as well.

Technology.name: Digitized Workloads
Technology.researchedDescription: Though impressive, these schematics are surprisingly affected by the intense industrial conditions of your machines.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemDigitalSchematic:0-1--The read-write circuits, though extremely precise and stable, still burn out after repeated use.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Your paper schematics are woefully stone age. Circuits and computers are more elegant, more efficient, and more durable.

Technology.name: Spacetime Manipulation
Technology.shortDescription: The question is: When did you ACTUALLY finish researching this?
Technology.researchedDescription: This is by far the greatest experimental success ever accomplished by Steve. You have discovered how to manipulate space and time itself.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemDimensionalMonopole:0-1--When placing a series of enderpearls at key localities around a compass, you find that the compass no longer points towards magnetic North. Instead, it appears to point toward key points in space.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemCrossDimensionalCommunicator:0-1--Placing a dimensional monopole in a simple assembly allows for transportation of minute amounts of material, such as vibrating air waves.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemTemporalResonator:0-1--Some quartz, hooked up to special circuits, and attached to a time keeping clock. This appears to warp time in the area around the item, with special effects in the epicenter.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemSelfFulfillingOracle:0-1--The self-fulfilling oracle uses predictive analyses while in the event horizon of the temporal resonator. These predictions propagate out, and have so far all come true seconds later.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: It's undeniable that creatures like Endermen have control over space. Nether quartz has remarkable properties with respect to time. Put energy through and they resonate at precise intervals. Combine them with some other processes and they seem to alter the flow of time itself. How can you magnify these effects?

Technology.name: Dimensional Braiding
Technology.researchedDescription: You invent a process called "Braiding". This process involves leaving together the effects of multiple "configurators", or specific key devices placed around a center catalyst. Whether for their effects, or for extra needed computation, these configurators are required to complete the specified process but are not consumed.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoEnmesher:0-1--Braiding together the effects results in items that can affect multiple realities simultaneously.____Recipe.Dimensional:Femtocraft:ItemPanLocationalComputer:0-1--Your first Braid, this computer can have multiple processes running in separate realities, and supports register swap operations with alternate dimensions.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Now that you have real working cross-dimensional manipulators, can you possibly compute their effects and automate use?

Technology.name: Locality Entangler
Technology.shortDescription: Integrate your machine's workspaces with other yous' other machines' workspaces.
Technology.researchedDescription: Your machines are now successfully outfitted to utilize the space of all unused machines of the same type in all other dimensions. This means that, on average, your machines can handle twice as many materials as normal. You figured it would be more, but it appears that a new branch of mathematics involving statistics and pan-dimensional probabilities shows a weird application of a sort of pigenhole principle which leads to this conclusion.
Technology.discoveredDescription: How inefficient your machines are! They merely use all the space available to them in THIS dimension. It's about time you did something about that.

Technology.name: Dimensional Transformation
Technology.researchedDescription: The materials between Nether and the overworld are made out of the same basic materials, but with a few...additions.__Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:netherrack:0-1--Netherrack____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:soul_sand:0-1--Soul Sand____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:glowstone_dust:0-1--Glowstone Dust____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:end_stone:0-1--End Stone____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:ghast_tear:0-1--Ghast Tear____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:nether_wart:0-1--Nether Wart____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:blaze_powder:0-1--Blaze Powder____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:netherbrick:0-1--Nether Brick____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemDustMalenite:0-2--Malenite__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Passing through the portal to the Nether, you can see vague similarities to the real world. However, everything is just...off. How similar are these things molecularly?

Technology.name: Temporal Pipelining
Technology.shortDescription: Start working in the next second, before it begins.
Technology.researchedDescription: This arcane process appears to chronoshift the effects of these "configurator" items to spontaneously apply to the catalyst item at arbitrary times. However, this continues even when the catalyst is taken far away from them. Perhaps, in time, you will find a use for this.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNanoHorologe:0-1--The temporal field of the internal Resonator appears to sweep across the configurator items, impregnating the catalyst with all of their potential effects.____Recipe.Temporal:Femtocraft:ItemInfallibleEstimator:0-1--You found this sitting on your desk one day. You vaguely remember taking it out of the machine later that day. Or was it yesterday? What machine?__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Your Temporal Resonators all synchronized as you began working on your next prototype. No matter what you you do, they refuse to de-synchronize. You better hurry up and finish before something terrible happens.

Technology.name: Reality Overclocker
Technology.researchedDescription: Your machines now temporarily back-shift in time every time they start a job. Thus, they always finish twice as fast as you expect.
Technology.discoveredDescription: More inefficiency! You can time shift items, why not machines?

Technology.name: Spacetime Exploitation
Technology.shortDescription: Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.
Technology.researchedDescription:
You are unlocking the key to creation itself. What are you now if not a God?
__Recipe.Dimensional:Femtocraft:ItemPandoraCube:0-1--Your next Braid begins as an empty box and is capable of cross-dimensionally storings its items. Or spontaneously generating new ones. Or losing things put into it already.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Now you can bend the fundamental rules of reality to your whim.

Technology.name: Quantum Interactivity
Technology.researchedDescription: These special logic gates comprise the basic universal quantum gate set. All logic in at the quantum level thus can be approximated with these 3 gates.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemCharosGate:0-1--Charos, the ferryman of Hades.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMinosGate:0-1--Minos, guardian of the Minotaur and judge of the dead.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemCerberusGate:0-1--Cerberus, guardian of Hades.__ Together, these 3 gates provide entrance into the realm of Quantum computing.
Technology.discoveredDescription: Quantum Bits, or Qubis, do not obey the rules of ordinary logic. Specialized logic gates must first be made.

Technology.name: Potential Harvesting
Technology.researchedDescription: __Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockCapacitorMicroCharging:0-1--This block temporarily stores the excess power generated by the coils, releasing it once the power surges abate.__By placing a capacitive setup at the top of the charging coil, you notice significant improvement in power generation in all weather. However, during rain storms this block becomes significantly more cost effective. During thunderstorms it shows that it is outright one of your best inventions.
Technology.discoveredDescription: While walking past your charging coils on a particularly humid day, you couldn't help but notice that the coils couldn't keep up with all of the energy in the air. Perhaps you could make something that would allow the coils to perform better in stormy conditions.

Technology.name: Thorium Fissibility
Technology.researchedDescription: Through further inspection of the structure of this Thorium Farenite salt, you figure out the method to safely dissassemble Farenite and discover its components.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemDustFarenite:0-1--Though highly unstable, this material is nothing different than any other, other than requiring better machines to process.__Additionally, this Thorium Farenite salt compound appears to let off radiant energy in a manner similar to Thorium itself. Perhaps you can harness this stable compound in a machine to gather this energy.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemIngotThFaSalt:0-1--Farenite appears to naturally bond with any Thorium it comes in contact with.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Thorium, that mysteriously useless metal that you find all over the ground, apparently reacts with Farenite to form a semi-stable isotope that radiates energy. Could you harness this in some way?

Technology.name: Harnessed Nuclear Decay
Technology.shortDescription: Do you have what it takes?
Technology.researchedDescription:
The molten Thorium-Farenite Salt allows for easy transfer of the energy-generating material to prevent heat over-saturation. Seeding this molten slurry with additional pure Thorium allows for scaling the energy output.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFissionReactorPlating:0-1--Required to lock in stray radiation and equipped with additional sensors.__ The Fission Reactor is a large, 3x3x3 structure. The center is the Fission Reactor Core, with the remaining blocks made out of Fission Reactor Housing. The reactor accepts 3 main types of items -> Salt, Thorium, and thermal reagants.
Salt - ThFa Salt Ingots Thorium - Pure Thorium Ingots Thermal - Ice/Lava/Fire Charges.
The reactor uses heat to melt ThFa into molten salt, and to melt Thorium to meet the user-designated target Thorium percentage. Molten salt and cooled salt generate heat passively, multiplied by the current Thorium percentage. Molten salt generates more heat than cooled salt.
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFissionReactorCore:0-1--Stores molten and cooled salt in separate containers. Contains a shielded mixing core with emergency dump capabilities.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFissionReactorHousing:0-1--A solid housing to lock in heat and radiation.__ The Magnetohydrodynamic Generator is also a large 3x3x3 structure, in order to house the complex mechanisms required. As Molten salt passes through the generator, it is converted into power, cooling the salt. Additionally, the natural breakdown of Thorium in the salt leads to a small amount of contaminants.
Contaminated Salt can be pumped directly back into the Fission Reactor to be reheated, but this drains the Thorium concentration, as the contaminants have to be drowned out.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockMagnetohydrodynamicGenerator:0-1--The flow of molten ThFa Salt through the generator generates power.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockSteamGenerator:0-1--An upgrade to the MHD Generator. It can be placed in the center of any of the 6 sides to dramatically increase power output.__
A 2x2x2 structure, the Decontamination Chamber uses a moderate amount of power to remove the contaminants from Contaminated Salt. A miniscule amount of loss is expected. The clean salt can be pumped back into the reactor for reheating without requiring additional Thorium.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockDecontaminationChamber:0-1--Chemical scrubbers charged by small amounts of power.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: You think you can design a system that can harness the natural decay of Thorium. This will not be easy, but it should generate as much power as you could ever need.

Technology.name: Applied Particle Physics
Technology.researchedDescription:
Continuing the natural trend. There are even fewer "Particles" than "Atoms".
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemCrystallite:0-1--Crystallite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMineralite:0-1--Mineralite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMetallite:0-1--Metallite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFaunite:0-1--Faunite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemElectrite:0-1--Electrite____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFlorite:0-1--Florite__
Technology.discoveredDescription: At last. You're nearing the bottom of the Rabbit Hole. Time to see what "Atoms" are made of.

Technology.name: Quantum Computing
Technology.shortDescription: Solve the superposition of all your problems.
Technology.researchedDescription:
For reasons unfathomable, some of these circuits work best when built around trigger objects. Something about space-time imprintation of the original object's purpose and affecting quantum probabilities.
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemErinyesCircuit:0-1--The three furies, protectors of the inner city of Dis.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemMinervaComplex:0-1--Goddess of Wisdom and bringer of knowledge.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemHermesBus:0-1--Messenger of the gods, information cannot travel faster through any other medium.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemOrpheusProcessor:0-1--A mortal who traveled to Hades and back. Multi-dimensional processing and 100% pipeline efficiency.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Relying upon the superposition of all possible states rather than a singular current state, quantum computing can solve NP-hard problems in linear time. The realm of computing has changed forever.

Technology.name: Quantum Robotics
Technology.researchedDescription: These modern machines operate based on the rules of quantum principles. Quite simply, you don't know how they work. They just do.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemAtlasMount:0-1--Capable of maintaining a grip on anything. Or, when you by chance need it to, releasing it as well.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemHerculesDrive:0-1--Stores uncountably many qubits of information.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Time to make macroscale machinery based upon quantum probabilities.

Technology.name: Element Manufacturing
Technology.shortDescription: Manufacture your own building blocks of the Universe.
Technology.researchedDescription: Okay, maybe not making new elements. Except machine elements. Same thing, right?__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFemtoPlating:0-1--Plated with pure diamond and using the most sophisticated hardware conceivable.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemInterfaceDeviceFemto:0-1--A final coating of Femto machinery to allow interface at the lowest physical level.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Nothing is beyond your reach now. Time to create the most sophisticated plating conceivable, with the most advanced mechanisms in the universe.

Technology.name: Dimensional Superpositions
Technology.researchedDescription: Represent infinite volumes and varieties of information in constant space.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoEntangler:0-1--Upscale Quantum principles with spacial effects upon multiple dimensions.____Recipe.Dimensional:Femtocraft:ItemInfiniteVolumePolychora:0-1--An infinitely large or small space contained inside a tiny fold.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: With quantum equations, you can represent multiple states at once. With dimensions, you can have multiple states exist simultaneously in different dimensions. What happens when you combine the two?

Technology.name: Multi-Dimensional Industry
Technology.researchedDescription: All of your machines are now outfitted with an infinite volume assembly. However much you can shove into them, they can accept.
Technology.discoveredDescription: With infinite volume spaces spread out across infinite alternate dimensions, you shouldn't have to worry about alternative dimensions using up your potential space.

Technology.name: Temporal Threading
Technology.shortDescription: Having multiple timelines do work at once.
Technology.researchedDescription: Now you no longer need to do simultaneous work in alternate dimensions. Every infinitely small timescale throws off a separate timeline due to quantum effects. You learn how to predict, cause, and select particular timelines.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoChronoshifter:0-1--Further improves the application of configurators by allowing them to work into the past of the object as well.____Recipe.Temporal:Femtocraft:ItemInfinitelyRecursiveALU:0-1--Calculates infinitely long mathematical chains, to allow infinitely precise math. Also has constant time infinite length mathematical operations.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Further refinements in the manipulation of Space-time allow for more precise time manipulation.

Technology.name: Causality Singularity
Technology.shortDescription: If you researched this, you never would have researched this.
Technology.researchedDescription: Your machines now constantly work upon every single possible timeline, only settling upon realizing the timeline that aligns with your intentions. Thus, whenever you put reagants into a machine, the machine instantly realizes the timeline where it already worked upon said reagant, resulting in what appears to be instaneous processes.
Technology.discoveredDescription: With discovery of time reversal, come potential superluminal-like causality paradoxes, such as the grandfather paradox. With infinite computational power, could you possibly solve and harness these paradoxes?

Technology.name: Demonic Particulates
Technology.researchedDescription: Only the otherworldy materials provided by the Nether are capable of containing the raw energy of Malenite.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemStyxValve:0-1--Pure Malenite powder with Nether Brick shielding. Even behind this shielding, the valve is almost too hot to hold.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemFemtoCoil:0-1--Raw power courses through the coil. You have to be careful to keep the ends capped, and your workshop already shows marks from your forgetfulness.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoCable:0-1--The air itself shimmers and vibrates from the intense energies flowing through these cables.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: If you can safely use Farenite, why not Malenite? Nether materials should be able to safely contain other Nether minerals.

Technology.name: Particle Excitation
Technology.shortDescription: Add heat directly where it counts.
Technology.researchedDescription: Capable of working on dozens of items simultaneously, the targeted excitation allows for super fast heat transfer.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoImpulser:0-1--Arguably the fastest furnace in existence.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Add heat directly to the particles that need it, and no others. Such a furnace could be the most efficient implementation possible.

Technology.name: Particle Manipulation
Technology.shortDescription: The best of the best of the best.
Technology.researchedDescription: You made it. You have reached the end of reality itself. There exists nothing else to drill down towards.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoRepurposer:0-1--Repurposes items by decomposing them into the fundamental particles of reality.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoCoagulator:0-1--Coagulates particles together into larger forms.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Once you figure out how to manipulate particles, what's next? What other purpose or discipline can possibly hold any weight once you become a reality engineer?

Technology.name: Spin Retention
Technology.researchedDescription: An infinite schematic. Once imprinted, it will hold its information indefinitely. The nether star means that any informational density will be imprinted and forever crystallized.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemQuantumSchematic:0-1--A nether star solid state information crystallization lattice, with input and output mechanisms.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: By harnessing the power of a Nether Star, you theorize you can create ever-lasting schematics. Finally, something that can handle the throughput required to sculpt reality.

Technology.name: Spontaneous Generation
Technology.shortDescription: Generate power where none appears to exist.
Technology.researchedDescription:
The Phlegethon Tunnel is one of the more creative machines you have envisioned. It taps into the molten cores of alternative dimension's planets. This is possible due to the micro variations from dimension to dimension. Some alternative dimensions's planets are a few metres, or maybe several kilometres in difference in spacial locality than your current dimension. Thus, what may simply be stone in your dimension could be the center of the earth for another. The Phlegethon Tunnel opens a tunnel to one of these dimensions and pulls in the heat from the core of that planet for use as energy in our world. The closer to the center of the planet the Phlegethon Tunnel Core lies, the more dimensions available to tap into, and the greater the power generation. Like electron locality probabilities, there is a quadratic falloff the greater the distance from the core.
The Phlegethon Tunnel is a 3x3x3 multiblock. The center is the Phlegethon Tunnel Core which houses one end of the portal. The remainder of the structure is Phlegethon Tunnel Frame, built to withstand intense heat and spacial anomalies.
The portal requires a Phlegethon Tunnel Primer to open. This dimensionally-transformed diamond acts as a spacial prism to capture a small primer charge to create a stable enough portal to transfer such intense energy.
WARNING: The portal burns so hot and requires such fine tuning that, should any piece of the Phlegethon Tunnel be removed while the portal is open, the intense energies will cause a spontaneous collapse and flood the core with intense heat, melting it irreperably.
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPhlegethonTunnelCore:0-1--Built to contain a portal inside the Nether Star, the core stabilizes and pulls energy from a wormhole to the core of an alternate reality's planet.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPhlegethonTunnelFrame:0-1--Built to withstand intense heat and to pull as much power as possible from it.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemPhlegethonTunnelPrimer:0-1--A dimensionally modified diamond. It reflects particular forms of energy within itself cross-dimensionally, acting like a laser does, using alternate versions of itself as mirrors.__
The Sisyphus Stabilizer can be placed at the center of any of the six sides of the Phlegethon Tunnel to generate more power. Great for Phlegethon Tunnels that are nowhere near bedrock.
Remember to close the portal first!
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockSisyphusStabilizer:0-1--A large block of iron. This absorbs spacial fluctuations and results in more energy passing through the portal.__
Using the interference waves of Farenite and Malenite, the Null Equalizer corrects the micro energy imbalances between the two.
__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockNullEqualizer:0-1--Alternates acting as Nano and Femto power storage devices.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: With access to alternate dimensions and timelines, it's likely that quantum fluctuations can lead to monumental changes in alternate dimensions. If you can tap into these fluctuations, you could find ways to grab energy from other dimensions where none exists in yours.

Technology.name: Corruption Stabilization
Technology.shortDescription: Contain the power of Hell itself.
Technology.researchedDescription:
Even large amounts of Malenite can successfully be contained with your miracle plating and Nether materials. You have successfully created the mega-energy repository known as the Femto Cube.
The Femto Cube is a 5x5x5 megastructure. The center is a fully functional Nano Cube. Femto Cube ports are placed on top of the Nano Cube's. The 8 slots around the ports are Femto Cube Chassis. These act as venting mechanisms to regulate the extreme standing energy fluctuations of Malenite. The remaining outside is Femto Cube Frame, used to reinforce the structure.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoCubeFrame:0-1--Femto plating reinforced with Nether Brick. Almost imperviable.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoCubePort:0-1--Energy transformation and regulation for extreme volumes.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockFemtoCubeChassis:0-1--A vent with automatic regulatory mechanisms.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: You have never seen the effects of large amounts of Malenite. Frankly, even you are afraid of what could happen. Time to confront your fears.

Technology.name: Stellar Mimicry
Technology.researchedDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
At last. You can lay claim to the prestigious title of being a Star Father. Your own star lies contained in the Stellarator, fusing together particles and releasing monumentous amounts of energy.
The Stellarator is a 5x5x5 multiblock. The center is the Stellarator Core. Stellarator Focuses can be attached to any of the sides of the core. These are used to focus the energy unleashed from Optical Masers into the Nether Star, feeding the Fusion Reaction in the core. The Optical Maser can only be attached to a Focus, and on the side directly opposite the Core. These will unleash the power needed to sustain the Fusion Reaction. As you may have guessed, the remainder is all Stellarator Housing.
Plasma Conduits are special reinforced channels built to withstand the unimaginable stress forces produced by a sustained Fusion Reaction.
The Plasma Vent analyzes Plasma Flows and can determine whether to vent said flow from the circuit.
The Stellarator operates upon a simple concept. The entire system must form a circuit. Plasma Flows are generated in the core by the Fusion Reaction, which is sustained by Optical Masers. Plasma flows have varying energy amounts, which can manifest as temperature or spontaneous fluctuations, known as volatility. Additionally, flows can also be Unstable, making them particularly spontaneous. These flows propagate out of the reactor into the plasma conduit. They then make their way through the circuit, back to the Stellarator Core.
The Plasma Flows produce events classified as Volatility Events. These are particularly nasty and often unavoidable byproducts.
The Temperature Spike Volatility Event occurs when the temperature of a Plasma Flow exceeds the temperature rating of its container. When this event occurs, all other plasma flows in the container get an upsurge in energy. Additionally, the excess temperature is put out into the nearby environment.
The Magnetic Fluctuation Volatility Event can occur when the instability of a Plasma Flow exceeds the stability rating of its container. Extreme magnetic forces whip throughout the nearby environment, acting upon all things nearby. Hold onto your hat.
The Plasma Leak Volatility Event occurs when a Plasma Flow encounters no next container in the circuit. The Flow and all other flows in the container escape into the world as super-hot loops of plasma.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:ItemStellaratorPlating:0-1--Pure Diamond is the only material that could even pretend to withstand the temperatures inside a star.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockStellaratorCore:0-1--Contains a Fusion Reaction inside the Nether Star.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockStellaratorHousing:0-1--Built to withstand as much heat, pressure, radiation, and magnetic stress as conceivably possible.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockStellaratorFocus:0-1--Funnels the power of Optical Maser into the smallest beam possible.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockStellaratorOpticalMaser:0-1--Concentrates energy into a beam of pure photons. Used to concentrate the transfer of power into as small an area as possible.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPlasmaConduit:0-1--Funnels Plasma Flows through Blaze Rods.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPlasmaVent:0-1--Analyzes and vents troublesome Plasma Flows.__
Technology.discoveredDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
You harvest energy from the cores of planets. You shift things back and forward in time. You make things exist in multiple dimensions simultaneously. You sit in bboredom staring at the sky.
The time for your ascension has come.
Time to become a God.
Time to create your own Star.

Technology.name: Energy Conversion
Technology.researchedDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
Harness the awesome power of your captive star to produce energy.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPlasmaSolenoid:0-1--Super heat resistant plating. Movement of plasma flows through the solenoid induce power generation.__
Technology.discoveredDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
Harness the power of Plasma Flows to generate power.

Technology.name: Matter Conversion
Technology.researchedDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
An application of E=MC2. Turns pure energy into mass by condensing the energy released from Plasma Flows.__Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:BlockPlasmaCondenser:0-1--Capable of exerting extreme pressure. Literally crushes energy into mass.__
Technology.discoveredDescription:
CURRENTLY UNIMPLEMENTED. RESEARCH FOR PROGRESSION. BUILD AT YOUR OWN CONSEQUENCE.
Harness the energy of Plasma Flows by transforming them into Mass.

Technology.name: Nether Star Fabrication
Technology.researchedDescription:
The most complicated knotting of materials imaginable. Mapped, taken apart, put together. Next?
__Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:nether_star:0-1--Though made out of molecules, it appears to rely upon entanglement effects upon key particles between molecules. Thus, only Femto-tier machines can properly handle this item.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: Nether Stars are some of the most devilishly constructed items you have ever seen. Time to figure out how create Occam's Knot.

Technology.name: Molecular Manipulation
Technology.shortDescription: Many machines mathematically manipulate molecules, many more merely make massive messes.
Technology.researchedDescription: With firm resolve, you start the path down the rabbit hole.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemKineticPulverizer:0-1--A reinforced piston with special circuitry to prevent over enthusiastic crushing.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemDissassemblyArray:0-1--A series of pulverizers together ensures maximum controlled destruction.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockMicroDeconstructor:0-1--This machine takes in any item and breaks it down into its micro-tier components.__With deconstructing items out of the way, it's probably a good idea to figure out a way to reconstruct them. Building is always harder than destroying, but somehow you've made it happen.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemArticulatingArm:0-1--A long assembly of metal with multiple degrees of freedom, ending with a precision implement.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:ItemAssemblyArray:0-1--Two arms working in tandem allow for the precise joining of components.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:BlockMicroReconstructor:0-1--Given a schematic and proper materials, this can turn micro-tier components back into useful things.__
Technology.discoveredDescription: With dutiful application of all the principles you have so learned, theoretically it should be possible to manipulate the underlying structures of matter.

Technology.name: Macroscopic Structures
Technology.researchedDescription: __Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:cake:0-1--Cake____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:lapis_block:0-1--Lapis Lazuli Block____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:coal_block:0-1--Block of Coal____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:hay_block:0-1--Hay Bale____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:ender_chest:0-1--Ender Chest____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:beacon:0-1--Beacon____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:leather_chestplate:0-1--Leather Tunic____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:leather_leggings:0-1--Leather Pants____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:chainmail_chestplate:0-1--Chain Chestplate____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:chainmail_leggings:0-1--Chain Leggings____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:stained_glass:0-8--White Stained Glass____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:map:0-0--Empty Map____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:tnt:0-1--TNT____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:oak_stairs:0-4--Oak Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:birch_stairs:0-4--Birch Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:spruce_stairs:0-4--Spruce Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:jungle_stairs:0-4--Jungle Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:acacia_stairs:0-4--Acacia Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:dark_oak_stairs:0-4--Dark Oak Wood Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:stone_stairs:0-4--Stone Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:brick_stairs:0-4--Brick Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:stone_brick_stairs:0-4--Stone Brick Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:nether_brick_stairs:0-4--Nether Brick Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:sandstone_stairs:0-4--Sandstone Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:quartz_stairs:0-4--Quartz Stairs____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:golden_carrot:0-1--Golden Carrot____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:speckled_melon:0-1--Glistering Melon____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:daylight_detector:0-1--Daylight Sensor____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:glass_pane:0-16--Glass Pane____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:leather_helmet:0-1--Leather Cap____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:leather_boots:0-1--Leather Boots____Recipe.Assembler:minecraft:chainmail_helmet:0-1--Chain
